titleStmt.title: The seaman's complaint for his unkind mistress of Wapping: together with the young woman's answer in her own vindication. To the tune of, I love you dearly, I love you well, &c. Licens'd and enter'd according to order, &c.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "When I went early in the spring ..."
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
